attributes.action: stop muslim religious extremists inciting race, homophobia, murder, sexism & sex inequality from preaching in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that THE Government stop, exclude and remove from this country
muslim religous extremists still undermining the fabric of the UK's well being 

we THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE and have ROOTS here, were under the impression that extremists were monitored, and stopped and where applicable were charged in a court of law, however 
on the TV dispatches programme 15th January 2006 on channel 4, re Muslim religious extremists inciting race, homophobia, murder, sexism & sex inequality from preaching in the mosques in the UK, this appears not to be so

We ask that where clear evidence is given that the law of the UK be applied without delay and that these people be removed or charged without delay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
